nodes.text: The Quesaya system was located in the Expansion Region's Andirma sector. It shared its name with the Quesaya Border Conflict that was fought in 4007 BBY. By 3996 BBY, the system was situated in the "civilized galaxy," an area that was well-explored by the Galactic Republic.
The Quesaya system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-15.
